definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: The production of ramie gauze and fabric is machined only then at 80 time initial stage.
sentences.chinese: 苎麻纱及织物的生产加工始于80年代初期。

sentences.english: The enzyme had better specificity for ramie retting.
sentences.chinese: 该酶对苎麻脱胶有较好的特异性。

sentences.english: The above results should be testified by ramie degumming process.
sentences.chinese: 上述酶类需要在苎麻脱胶过程中作进一步的研究。

sentences.english: Finally, the relationships of ethylene and sexual differentiation of ramie were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最后对乙烯与苎麻的性别决定进行了讨论。

sentences.english: The optimized process of exhaustion and pad- dry-cure methods for ramie modification were determined.
sentences.chinese: 确定了采用吸尽法和浸轧法进行苎麻改性的最佳工艺。

sentences.english: The factors influencing enzymatic treatment of ramie fabric were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了酶处理苎麻织物的影响因素。

sentences.english: Since the ramie of different lots has been mixed up, the ship has to pay for sorting marks.
sentences.chinese: 既然不同票苎麻混装了，船方就得支付分标志费。

sentences.english: I am peeling the hemp to get fibers.
sentences.chinese: 我在刮苎麻的皮肉，取其纤维。

sentences.english: The application possibility of non-woven noil ramie fiber mat in composites was also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了苎麻落麻纤维无纺毡复合材料的应用。

definition: jute (Corchorus capsularis Linn.)/plant fiber used for rope or sacks
moso bamboo (Phyllostachys edulis), used as timber etc
